comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Jesse Isidor Straus (1872-1936), US ambassador to France; nephew to Oscar S. Straus: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jesse_I._Straus His wife was the former Irma Nathan (1877-1970). Percy Selden Straus was Jesse Straus's brother, and chairman of the board at Macy's and an avid art collector; research.frick.org/directoryweb/browserecord.php?-action=... his wife was the former Edith Abraham (1882-1957), daughter of businessman Abraham Abraham: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abraham_Abraham
